tool_description: Retrieves current account status, suspension history, and basic account metadata for workflow decision-making.

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer account

include_history.description: Whether to include historical suspension records

error_messages: Account not found: The provided account_id does not exist in the system. Verify the account identifier.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to view this account. Check user authorization levels.
System unavailable: Account database is temporarily inaccessible. Retry after a few minutes.
usage: Provide account_id to get current status; set include_history to false if only current status is needed.

account_id.description: The account identifier that was queried

current_status.description: Current account status: active, suspended, closed, or pending

last_suspension_date.description: Date of most recent suspension, if any

account_creation_date.description: Date when the account was created
